channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.description: Trump arrived in New York amid growing concerns among some investors about his economic plans as Harris casts his agenda as a financially calamitous w...

item.title: Apple Looks to AI to End iPhone Slump
item.description: Meanwhile, artificial intelligence has yet to spur a wave of upgrades for other smartphone makers.

item.title: Fact-checking GOP Trump fliers flooding swing-state mailboxes
item.description: Trump plays defense on ‘Project 2025’ while falsely attacking Kamala Harris’s record.

item.title: More Black Americans are certain to vote for Harris, Post-Ipsos poll finds
item.description: A Post-Ipsos poll finds that the commitment of Black Americans to vote this fall has rebounded since Harris became the Democratic nominee.

item.title: Is Sweden Turning the Corner on Open Borders?

item.title: Harris targets small business tax break in contrast with Trump’s corporate tax cuts
item.description: The vice president looks to beef up her economic plans ahead of next week's debate.

item.title: Amazon Wants Your Palm and TSA Wants Your Face. What Saying Yes Will Mean.
item.description: Using your body’s data to pay or breeze through security is like unlocking your phone—sort of.

item.title: Congress returns to deal with looming federal spending deadline
item.description: Government funding will expire on Sept. 30. Lawmakers plan to start working on a temporary fix.

item.title: How Republicans and Democrats paint starkly different pictures of America
item.description: This summer's conventions featured strongly diverging visions of the future — and the present.

item.title: Nvidia Draws Antitrust Scrutiny as Enforcers Signal Early Interest in AI
item.description: The Justice Department’s probe of the chip company highlights interest in being more aggressive than in years past.

item.title: Vance warns of China’s influence during Michigan rally
item.description: Vance’s rally Tuesday was the first of a series of events in Rust Belt swing states that he and Trump are visiting this week.

item.title: The Battle to Ban Screens From School Now Includes Chromebooks and Tablets
item.description: After working to ban phones in the classroom, parents are now seeking a return to pencil and paper.
